Articles.Content:
Introducing the least aerodynamic plane possible (it still flys!)!

Halco Industries is proud to bring you the "Wat"

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/BmL3A)

Feel free to paint it and submit your colorations of it with KerbPaint!

Download: [http://www./download/17q1o8etba25j0e/Halco+-+Wat.craft](http://www./download/17q1o8etba25j0e/Halco+-+Wat.craft)

> 
> Now fly it in FAR. >:3

Haha, you're funny
Is it just me, or does it look a lot like a paper airplane? +rep

> 
> Is it just me, or does it look a lot like a paper airplane? +rep

Not that similar, paper planes don't have tailfins
